registration.communicationDataHint: The following data is needed to contact you in case you need to clarify the data
registration.hintText: Check your E-mail, in order to continue. If nothings received, check your spam folder or repeat!

login.bandingCenter: Center for Ringing Birds at the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Belarus

editObservation.birdDescription: Describe the bird and the circumstances in which you saw it.
editObservation.ringDescription: Fill in the rings info or other tags you saw on the bird. Also, their location and number.
editObservation.oneMoreRing: THERE IS ANOTHER RING ON THE BIRD
editObservation.obstaclesDescription: Where and when did you see the bird? Leave a comment if you want to add something
editObservation.linkToAppFirstPart: You can determine the bird using
editObservation.commentBlockDescription: If you want to add something - leave a comment
editObservation.addPhotoDescription: Add a photo of the bird. Would be great, if it's possible to see the ring with its number on it

passwordRecovery.statusText: We just sent you a new password!
passwordRecovery.instructionText: Enter your E-mail, so we could send you a new password
passwordRecovery.hintText: Check your E-mail for your new password. You could change it later.
passwordRecovery.academy: at the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Belarus

deleteObservation.deleteObservationReason: We would be grateful, if you provide us a reason

observationItem.addSameBirdObservation: Add observation of the same bird
